autumn.util.functors

Class FileProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.internals.AbstractStaticFunctor
      • autumn.util.functors.FileProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Functor, StaticFunctor, TypedFunctor

    public final class FileProcessor
extends AbstractStaticFunctor
    An instance of this functor-type is a functor that accepts a file argument.
